definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: This is what preacher’s talk of - this light in the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 传教士会说，这黑暗中的光芒啊。

sentences.english: This thesis made a research on the transmissive subject of early Buddhism in China from the transmissive perspective.
sentences.chinese: 本文从传播学角度对佛教早期在华传教主体进行研究。

sentences.english: We young Mormon men enter the Aaronic priesthood when we're twelve.
sentences.chinese: 我们年轻的摩门男子在十二岁时就是次级传教士了。

sentences.english: These churchmen 's acquaintance with France stopped short at Joan of Arc.
sentences.chinese: 这些传教士对法国的了解仅限于有关圣女贞德的传说。

sentences.english: The introduction of western medicine into China was closely related to the medical activities of western missionaries in China.
sentences.chinese: 西医学的传入与传教士在华的医学活动分不开。

sentences.english: The governments of some countries forbid us to proselyte.
sentences.chinese: 有些国家的政府禁止我们传教。

sentences.english: Parents are entitled to send their children to school without having to proselytize somebody having somebody else's religion.
sentences.chinese: 父母有权无需传教有人要开别人的宗教来送孩子上学。

sentences.english: Through education and awareness-raising activities, China has made great efforts to improve capabilities of the general public of dealing with infectious diseases.
sentences.chinese: 我们还通过宣传教育提高人民群众应对疫情的能力。

sentences.english: In the same year an itinerant black preacher arrived in Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 就在同一年，一个黑人巡回传教士抵达了洛杉矶。

sentences.english: Mr Black renounces the world, the flesh, and the devil, preaches and prays day and night.
sentences.chinese: 布莱克先生放弃了红尘，早晚传教祷告。

sentences.english: When the fox preaches, the cock should ponder.
sentences.chinese: 假定狐狸传教，公鸡便该沉思。

sentences.english: The preacher sermonized to the teacher's teacup.
sentences.chinese: 传教士对著老师的茶杯说教。

sentences.english: His missionary journeys laid the foundations of Christianity in the Empire.
sentences.chinese: 他传教的历程在帝国铺下了基督教的基础。

sentences.english: They conducted evangelistic missions around Britain.
sentences.chinese: 他们在英国各地进行福音传教活动。

sentences.english: This Ordinance may be cited as the Pontifical Foreign Missions Institute Incorporation Ordinance.
sentences.chinese: 本条例可引称为《宗座外方传教会法团条例》。

sentences.english: The missionaries were confronted with a conservative, almost fanatical form of Islam.
sentences.chinese: 传教士要面对保守甚至狂热的伊斯兰信众。

definition: to lecture on doctrine/to expound the wisdom of ancient sages/to preach/a sermon
to pass on doctrines from master to disciple (Buddhism)
the Church (as Royal Court)/the Holy See/the Vatican
a Jesuit/member of Society of Jesus
